entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or freezing drizzle this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
